title: A tip to all bronze people
body:
First, bronze = trash
but if you want to be less trash and move to silver at least, then learn to look at the MINI MAP  and help your team. thats something every fucking bronze doesnt do
also they never listen to anything, to pings, to calls, its soo frustrating. so just work on those things that bronze never do and you just get into at least silver v which is still trash but less trash

replies.body: I'm looking for the purpose of this thread but I can't find one ಠ_ಠ

Uh huh FruitSalad is very right.
VERY Arrogant

First, Bronze = new player

If your hanging in this ELO its because your either too scared to play on your main account or your one of those players who likes to smurf in bronze and pretend they are faker, gosu, dade, imp, etc....

Yes, your correct. most bronze players need to work on their awareness. its one of the key factors that helps them get promoted in ranked and progress into silver. but if you think you can just stomp your way onto the forums and talk big cause your little man syndrome thinks you have entitlement THINK AGAIN!

Regardless of rank, everyone deserves abit of respect, courtesy and friendliness.

**offer advise, not talk down to people.. it really helps**

Have a nice day
